dhanaya ha adhyapanaya anuwa padanamwu chanda balaya pathiri giyath 1921 di wyawasthadayaka sabhawe sitiye eka sinhala bauddhayeku pamanaya. 1911 n pasuwa aarambhawuye kristhiyani sinhala kalu suddan ha damila nayakayinwana ponnambalam sahodarayin athara rate deshapalana balaya pilimbaadawa athiwu aragalayaki. 1921-24 kalayedi wenama damila eelamak sandaha wyawasthadayaka sabhawen arambauna me aragalaya ada 2017 dith esema pawathinne buddhagama, pansala ha ashoka adhirajayage dharma wijaya palana kramaya kese wethath, lichchawi bauddha rajya palana prathipaththi katha kirimatawath kenek chandayen theri path nowu nisaya. 1931 di sarwajana chandabalaya dimata wiruddha nowu ekama deshapalakayawuye kamkaru nayaka ee ee gunasinha mahatha pamanaya.
